description:
A dangerous predator on the streets of Bangalore - lurking in the shadows leaving women feeling unsafe. He changed the whole landscape of this city.

Find out more about the beast in Beast of Bangalore on 16th December, only on XPlay

metadata.cast: Vijay (Agent Veera Raghavan), Pooja Hegde (Preethi) and Selvaraghavan (Althaf Hussain)

title: Beast of Bangalore

description: Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) gives up his crime-fighting identity of Spider-Man in a desperate attempt to return to ordinary life and keep the love of MJ (Kirsten Dunst).  But a ruthless, terrifying new villain, the multi-tentacled Doc Ock, forces Peter to swing back into action to save everything he holds dear. CBFC U, CFL/1/36/2004-Mum.

metadata.cast: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Alfred Molina, Rosemary Harris, Donna Murphy

title: The Amazing Spider Man 2

description: A death in the village of Dakshina Kannada leads to a war between the villagers and the forces of evil.

metadata.cast: Rishab Shetty (Kaadubettu Shiva), Sapthami Gowda (Leela), Kishore Kumar G (Muralidhar), Manasi Sudhir (Kamala), Achyuth Kumar (Devendra Suttooru)

title: Kantara

description: RC15 is the working title of an upcoming Telugu-language political thriller film directed by S. Shankar who also wrote the screenplay, based on a story by Karthik Subbaraj. Produced by Dil Raju and Sirish under Sri Venkateswara Creations, the film stars Ram Charan and Kiara Advani.
title: RC 15

description: A mythic and emotionally charged hero's journey, "Dune" tells the story of Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, who must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people

metadata.cast: Lorem ipsum (Black Widow), sit amet (Wolverine), consectetur adipiscing (XMan). Lobortis enim (Spider Man)

title: Test Movie 5
